pullrequest.title: Performance: Delete / insert models as we need them in view

content.raw:
Thank you for testing this and letting us know how the rate is changing for you. We're still thinking of other ways to improve performance, this is just a first pass.

It's surprising to me though that the control strategy for the robot would be affected by the RTF.
content.html:
Thank you for testing this and letting us know how the rate is changing for you. We're still thinking of other ways to improve performance, this is just a first pass.

It's surprising to me though that the control strategy for the robot would be affected by the RTF.
